jaxws:class.name: WSNBRWResourceNotDestroyedFault
jaxws:class.jaxws:javadoc: This class provides the implementation of the WSN ResourceNotDestroyedFault fault, as defined in the standard OASIS WSDL file brw-2.wsdl. The class has a different name to the fault because of a naming conflict discovered when generating java classes using the JAX-WS wsimport tool.
